English: Emotional pain is the situation of a mother who only talks to her father ... without words ...
Filipino: sakit sa damdamin ang setwasyon ng isang ina dto gago lang ang tatay ... walang salita ...

English: Miss Jean's laugh was so adorable.
Filipino: Ang cute ng tawa ni Miss Jean

English: Why are churches allowed after gyms and spas are banned?
Filipino: Bakit simbahan pinayagan tapos gyms and spas bawal ?

English: I salute you sir MAR you are right to bring back decency to the people!
Filipino: I salute you sir MAR tama po sinabi nio ibalik ang disente sa tao !

English: Good morning, sir. I have an important message for you.
Filipino: Magandang umaga, sir. May importante akong message para sayo.

English: To ensure the quality of the product, please follow these instructions carefully.
Filipino: Para i-ensure ang quality ng product, paki-follow ang instructions nang maingat.

English: I'm looking forward to your presentation next week.
Filipino: Inaasahan ko ang iyong presentasyon sa susunod na linggo.

English: Can you tell me where the nearest train station is, please?
Filipino: Maaari po bang sabihin ninyo sa akin kung nasaan ang pinakamalapit na istasyon ng tren?

English: The company's quarterly report showed a 15% increase in revenue.
Filipino: Ang quarterly report ng kumpanya ay nagpakita ng 15% na pagtaas sa kita.

English: You need to be responsible for the actions you take.
Filipino: May pananagutan ka sa iyong mga ginagawa.
